attributes.action: Stop the scrapping of the Human Rights Act!
attributes.additional_details:
Bust some myths and learn what the human rights act does for us/you.

https://www.liberty-human-rights.org.uk/human-rights/what-are-human-rights/human-rights-act/human-rights-act-mythbuster
attributes.background:
The Tory led government has every intention of scrapping the human rights act for a British Bill of Rights.

The human rights act protects every single one of us, bust the myths and learn its importance. 

The people of the United Kingdom must hold David Cameron's government to account.
